meanings.sent1: The overzealous fans cheered loudly at the game.
meanings.sent2: She was overzealous in her support for the team.
meanings.sent3: The overzealous puppy wagged its tail so hard it knocked over a vase.
meanings.sent4: His overzealous dedication to his work burned him out quickly.
meanings.sent5: The overzealous student completed all the extra credit assignments.

meanings.sent1: The overzealous salesman tried to sell me three vacuums.
meanings.sent2: She was overzealous in her pursuit of the perfect gift.
meanings.sent3: The overzealous chef added too much spice to the soup.
meanings.sent4: His overzealous ambition led him to take on too many projects.
meanings.sent5: The overzealous gardener planted a variety of flowers in the garden.
